District health planning
Planning in the district should arise from the different healthcentres and other units within its jurisdiction.  This isimportant so that strategies adopted by each unit reflecttheir situation.
To ensure that the planning focus of different units is the
same, it is important to follow a framework for planningbased on the health policies and goals of the province.
